courses.title: Web dev basics
courses.content: Life finds a way. God creates dinosaurs. God destroys dinosaurs. God creates Man. Man destroys God. Man creates Dinosaurs. Hey, take a look at the earthlings. Goodbye! I was part of something special. I gave it a cold? I gave it a virus. A computer virus.

courses.title: CSS basics
courses.content: Must go faster... go, go, go, go, go! We gotta burn the rain forest, dump toxic waste, pollute the air, and rip up the OZONE! 'Cause maybe if we screw up this planet enough, they won't want it anymore! Yes, Yes, without the oops! Yeah, but John, if The Pirates of the Caribbean breaks down, the pirates donâ€™t eat the tourists.

courses.title: Javascript basics
courses.content: I gave it a cold? I gave it a virus. A computer virus. God help us, we're in the hands of engineers. They're using our own satellites against us. And the clock is ticking. Forget the fat lady! You're obsessed with the fat lady! Drive us out of here! Yes, Yes, without the oops!
